column5: I was busy loading garbage into my truck and was not paying much attention to the big lake at the bottom of the yard...lol....talk about missing the obvious! Anyhoo, i catch a glimpse and there it was....THE BACK OF OUR BAY IS STARTING TO ICE OVER!!!!....only a couple of weeks now till i walk down the lawn .....tie a rope round the spruce....inch my way out with the ice pics and a pdf and drill a couple holes!   OUR BAY THIS MORNING

HOT DAYUMMM!!!!!  One of my favourite reports of the year is when the Iceman Cometh   :D  Just thinkin' out loud here...your Adobe Acrobat Reader is not gonna help you when you go through   A pfd might be a wiser choice
LOL JB....a pdf definitely wont help me...cuz i'm running freekin' Vista and my Adobe is shot to hell anyway...lol.
hahahahahahahha  I love this time of year!
That's getting me excited.  I think I may go build an ice hut..  Maybe two..
Pfffffffffffffft!!!!!!! That's not ice!!!!!! This is ice!!!!!!  Took these last week on a business trip North of me.
that made me go get some hot chocolate!
just noticed my snowshoes hanging in the shed collecting dust... i'll be in your backyard soon anders.  there's a 4lb squaretail with my name on it january 1st.
this weather keeps up here...i dont think so....i heard the walleye were starting to spawn!
I'm the only one in my office waiting for winter! Bring on the hard water season! Thanks for pics Limeyangler.
Oh, I cant wait.... Charged the vexilar and sharpened the hook's the other night.  It will be worth the trip up in a few weeks..  Love those pictures..  Great post!
i honestly would be excited if the hardwater season was ...well...maybe in July when it was warmer out ...but its not .....so where did i put my hibernation blanket...
